TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed GridLines extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the gridline styles for controls that display items in a table structure.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The GridLines enumeration represents the different gridline styles for controls that display items in a table structure. You can display the horizontal, the vertical, both the horizontal and vertical, or no grid lines.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to use the GridLines enumeration to indicate that the gridlines in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control should be hidden.
[!code-vb[GridViewGridLines#1](~/add/codesnippet/VisualBasic/t-system.web.ui.webcontr_400_1.aspx)] [!code-cs[GridViewGridLines#1](~/add/codesnippet/CSharp/t-system.web.ui.webcontr_400_1.aspx)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridLines Both = int32(3)

Docs.summary: Both horizontal and vertical gridlines are rendered.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridLines Horizontal = int32(1)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridLines None = int32(0)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridLines Vertical = int32(2)
